itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway bring you the realest fake news of the week starting with last night's VP debate between Kamala Harris and Mike Pence, Michigan Gretchen Whitmer almost got kidnapped by a militia, Trump declassifies Hilary's emails and Obama's spying documents, Netflix is being sued over the film "Cuties", Democratic candidate Roger Montoya of New Mexico is being asked to step down because of his porn history past, and Ken and Karen get indicted in St. Louis.
